GSD.description:
drm/gma500: Fix WARN_ON(lock->magic != lock) error

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.12 by commit 55c077d97fa67e9f19952bb24122a8316b089474. For more details please see the references link.
